Talent.Name: Air of Authority
Talent.Benefit: Affect more targets with Command.

Talent.Name: Ambidextrous
Talent.Benefit: Use either hand equally well—reduce penalties for using two weapons.

Talent.Name: Berserk Charge
Talent.Benefit: Gain an extra bonus to hit when charging.

Talent.Name: Blind Fighting
Talent.Benefit: Suffer half usual penalties for obscured vision.

Talent.Name: Catfall
Talent.Benefit: Reduce falling damage.

Talent.Name: Cold Hearted
Talent.Benefit: Immune to Seduction, resistant to Charm.

Talent.Name: Combat Formation
Talent.Benefit: Use intelligence bonus for Initiative.

Talent.Name: Combat Sense
Talent.Benefit: Use Per bonus instead of Ag bonus for Initiative.

Talent.Name: Deadeye Shot
Talent.Benefit: Reduce penalties for ranged called shots.

Talent.Name: Die Hard
Talent.Benefit: Improves chances of surviving Blood Loss.

Talent.Name: Disarm
Talent.Benefit: Force opponent to drop weapon.

Talent.Name: Disturbing Voice
Talent.Benefit: +10 to Intimidate, –10 to Charm.

Talent.Name: Double Team
Talent.Benefit: Gain additional +10 for outnumbering opponent.

Talent.Name: Enemy
Talent.Benefit: An organization or group particularly despises the character.

Talent.Name: Ferric Summons
Talent.Benefit: Can summon larger metallic objects.

Talent.Name: Frenzy
Talent.Benefit: Enter psychotic rage to gain combat bonuses.

Talent.Name: Heightened Senses†
Talent.Benefit: Gain +10 bonus to particular sense.

Talent.Name: Iron Jaw
Talent.Benefit: Test Toughness to overcome Stunning.

Talent.Name: Jaded
Talent.Benefit: Ignore mundane horrors.

Talent.Name: Leap Up
Talent.Benefit: Stand as a Free Action.

Talent.Name: Light Sleeper
Talent.Benefit: Count as awake even when sleeping.

Talent.Name: Lightning Reflexes
Talent.Benefit: Roll twice and take the highest for Initiative rolls.

Talent.Name: Meditation
Talent.Benefit: Character may enter a trance to ignore Fatigue.

Talent.Name: Mimic
Talent.Benefit: Character can copy voices.

Talent.Name: Orthoproxy
Talent.Benefit: +20 bonus to resist mind control or interrogation.

Talent.Name: Peer
Talent.Benefit: Character has good reputation amongst chosen group.

Talent.Name: Polyglot
Talent.Benefit: Character has innate grasp of languages.

Talent.Name: Psychic Power†
Talent.Benefit: May take one psychic power.

Talent.Name: Quick Draw
Talent.Benefit: Draw weapon as Free Action.

Talent.Name: Radiant Presence
Talent.Benefit: Character has an inspiring aura.

Talent.Name: Rapid Reload
Talent.Benefit: Reduce reload time.

Talent.Name: Resistance†
Talent.Benefit: Gain +10 bonus to particular resistance Test.

Talent.Name: Sound Constitution
Talent.Benefit: Gain an additional Wound.

Talent.Name: Street Fighting
Talent.Benefit: Add half WS to Critical Damage.

Talent.Name: Sure Strike
Talent.Benefit: Reduce penalties for melee Called Shots.

Talent.Name: Takedown
Talent.Benefit: Make special attack to stun opponent.

Talent.Name: Technical Knock
Talent.Benefit: Un-jam gun as Half Action.

Talent.Name: Total Recall
Talent.Benefit: Character can remember trivial facts and minor details.

Talent.Name: Unarmed Warrior
Talent.Benefit: Improves unarmed attacks.

Talent.Name: Unremarkable
Talent.Benefit: Character is easily forgettable.

Talent.Name: Warp Sense
Talent.Benefit: Allows Psyniscience Test as Free Action.

Talent.Name: Weapon-Tech
Talent.Benefit: Increase potency of advanced weaponry.

Talent.Name: Weapon Training†
Talent.Benefit: Use Weapon Group without penalty.

Talent.Name: Ambush
Talent.Benefit: Inflict additional Damage on Unaware targets.

Talent.Name: Calculated Barrage
Talent.Benefit: Pin targets with Indirect Fire.

Talent.Name: Drop Trooper
Talent.Benefit: Bonus to Operate Test for grav-chutes.

Talent.Name: Duelist
Talent.Benefit: Bonus to engaging single opponents.

Talent.Name: Excellent Cook
Talent.Benefit: Fix a hearty meal to provide squad mates with a bonus to resist Fear and Pinning.

Talent.Name: Heroic Inspiration
Talent.Benefit: Use Inspire Special Use of the Command Skill as a Half Action.

Talent.Name: Lasgun Volley
Talent.Benefit: Inflict extra Damage with Ranged Volley Order when wielding a Las weapon.

Talent.Name: Modify Payload
Talent.Benefit: Increase Damage, Blast Quality, and Smoke Quality of explosives.

Talent.Name: Pugilist
Talent.Benefit: Feint as a Free Action with Unarmed Standard Attack and Called Shot Actions.

Talent.Name: Push the Limit
Talent.Benefit: Bonus to Vehicle Manoeuvre Tests with Structural Integrity loss on a Failed Test.

Talent.Name: Swift Suture
Talent.Benefit: End Blood Loss condition when performing First Aid.

Talent.Name: Vigilant
Talent.Benefit: Use Perception instead of Agility for Overwatch.

Talent.Name: Wrestler
Talent.Benefit: Use Athletics Skill instead of Strength Characteristic while

Talent.Name: Armour-Monger
Talent.Benefit: Increase the efficacy of physical armour.

Talent.Name: Battle Rage
Talent.Benefit: Parry while frenzied.

Talent.Name: Bulging Biceps
Talent.Benefit: Remove bracing requirement from certain weapons.

Talent.Name: Combat Master
Talent.Benefit: Opponents get no bonus for outnumbering the character.

Talent.Name: Counter Attack
Talent.Benefit: May attack after successful Parry.

Talent.Name: Crack Shot
Talent.Benefit: Add +2 to ranged Crit Damage.

Talent.Name: Crippling Strike
Talent.Benefit: Add +2 to melee Crit Damage.

Talent.Name: Deflect Shot
Talent.Benefit: Add WS Bonus to AP against Primitive ranged attacks.

Talent.Name: Exotic Weapon Tr.
Talent.Benefit: Gain proficiency with one exotic weapon.

Talent.Name: Foresight
Talent.Benefit: Contemplate to gain +10 bonus to next Test.

Talent.Name: Furious Assault
Talent.Benefit: On a successful WS Test, gain a free second attack.

Talent.Name: Hard Target
Talent.Benefit: –20 to hit character when he Charges or Runs.

Talent.Name: Hardy
Talent.Benefit: Character always heals as if lightly wounded.

Talent.Name: Hatred†
Talent.Benefit: Gain +10 bonus to attack hated creatures.

Talent.Name: Hip Shooting
Talent.Benefit: Characters may shoot when moving.

Talent.Name: Hotshot Pilot
Talent.Benefit: Character can drive or fly anything.

Talent.Name: Independent Target
Talent.Benefit: Fire at multiple targets more than 10 metres apart.

Talent.Name: Inspire Wrath
Talent.Benefit: Inspire crowd to hatred and anger.

Talent.Name: Iron Discipline
Talent.Benefit: Comrades resist Pinning and Fear.

Talent.Name: Killing Strike
Talent.Benefit: Spend Fate Point to make melee attacks unavoidable.

Talent.Name: Luminen Shock
Talent.Benefit: Character can discharge energy in melee attack.

Talent.Name: Maglev Transcend.
Talent.Benefit: Character can hover for longer periods of time.

Talent.Name: Marksman
Talent.Benefit: No penalties for firing at long or extreme range.

Talent.Name: Mechadendrite Use†

Talent.Benefit: Detals

Talent.Name: Nerves of Steel
Talent.Benefit: Reroll Pinning Tests.

Talent.Name: Paranoia
Talent.Benefit: Character is always alert for danger.

Talent.Name: Precise Blow
Talent.Benefit: Reduce penalty for melee called shots.

Talent.Name: Prosanguine
Talent.Benefit: Test to heal 1d5 Damage.

Talent.Name: Rapid Reaction
Talent.Benefit: Test Ag to ignore surprise.

Talent.Name: Sharpshooter
Talent.Benefit: Decrease penalty for ranged called shots.

Talent.Name: Strong Minded
Talent.Benefit: May reroll failed WP Tests to resist Psychic Powers.

Talent.Name: Storm of Iron
Talent.Benefit: Allocate extra full-auto and semi-auto hits to additional targets within five metres.

Talent.Name: Swift Attack
Talent.Benefit: May make multiple melee attacks.

Talent.Name: Two-Weapon Wielder†
Talent.Benefit: May fight with two weapons.

Talent.Name: Unarmed Master
Talent.Benefit: Deadly fighter while unarmed.

Talent.Name: Unshakable Faith
Talent.Benefit: May reroll failed Fear Tests.

Talent.Name: Warp Conduit
Talent.Benefit: Spend Fate Point to get +1d5 to Psy Rating.

Talent.Name: Whirlwind of Death
Talent.Benefit: Make one attack for each melee opponent.

Talent.Name: Ace Operator
Talent.Benefit: Reduce Degrees of Failure on failed Operate Tests by Agility Bonus.

Talent.Name: Chain Expertise
Talent.Benefit: Add additional Damage die for Tearing with Chain weapons.

Talent.Name: Cleanse and Purify
Talent.Benefit: Increase chance to ignite foes with Flame weapons.

Talent.Name: Creative Killer
Talent.Benefit: Deal improved Damage with Improvised Weapons.

Talent.Name: Cybernetic Boost
Talent.Benefit: Gain Unnatural Strength or Agility Traits by overcharging cybernetic limbs or mechadendrites.

Talent.Name: Guardian
Talent.Benefit: Spend a Fate Point to trade places with an ally targeted by an attack

Talent.Name: Las Expertise
Talent.Benefit: Impose a penalty on opponents attempting to Dodge attacks with Las weapons.

Talent.Name: Melta Expertise
Talent.Benefit: Increase the Range of Melta weapons by a number of metres equal to Ballistic Skill Bonus.

Talent.Name: Methodical Care
Talent.Benefit: Reduce Damage suffered by patients for failed Medicae Extended Care Tests by Intelligence Bonus

Talent.Name: Persuasive Charm
Talent.Benefit: Use Charm Skill to gain a bonus to Logistics Tests.

Talent.Name: Plasma Expertise
Talent.Benefit: Reduce the chance of the Overheats Quality triggering when wielding a Plasma weapon

Talent.Name: Rite of Static Overload
Talent.Benefit: Gain Shocking Quality on melee attacks with a Cybernetic limb or mechadendrite.

Talent.Name: Skilled Rider
Talent.Benefit: Avoid being thrown from mounts and Mount/Dismount as a Half Action.

Talent.Name: SP Expertise
Talent.Benefit: Reload as a Free Action after successfully clearing a Jammed Solid Projectile weapon

Talent.Name: Stealth Sniper
Talent.Benefit: Chance to remain hidden after making a ranged attack.

Talent.Name: Tank Hunter
Talent.Benefit: Add BS Bonus to weapon Penetration against vehicles.

Talent.Name: Tireless
Talent.Benefit: Ignore Fatigue penalty.

Talent.Name: Unstoppable Charge
Talent.Benefit: Improve Charge Action and Crushing

Talent.Name: Arms Master
Talent.Benefit: Less penalty for using weapons untrained.

Talent.Name: Assassin Strike
Talent.Benefit: After making melee attack, test Acrobatics to move.

Talent.Name: Bastion of Iron Will
Talent.Benefit: Gain bonus to Opposed Tests when defending against psychic powers.

Talent.Name: Blademaster
Talent.Benefit: Reroll missed attack, once per Round.

Talent.Name: Blade Dancer
Talent.Benefit: Reduced penalties for fighting with two melee weapons.

Talent.Name: Crushing Blow
Talent.Benefit: Add half WS Bonus to Damage inflflicted in melee.

Talent.Name: Eye of Vengeance
Talent.Benefit: Adds Damage and Pen to ranged attack.

Talent.Name: Favoure by the Warp
Talent.Benefit: Roll twice for Psychic Phenomena and choose.

Talent.Name: Fearless
Talent.Benefit: Immune to Fear and Pinning.

Talent.Name: Gunslinger
Talent.Benefit: Reduce penalties for fifighting with two pistols.

Talent.Name: Hammer Blow
Talent.Benefit: Make a thunderous strike with a melee weapon.

Talent.Name: Infused Knowledge
Talent.Benefit: Know a little bit about everything.

Talent.Name: Into the Jaws of Hell
Talent.Benefit: Comrades ignore Fear and Pinning.

Talent.Name: Lasgun Barrage
Talent.Benefit: Additional DoS when firing Las weapons.

Talent.Name: Lightning Attack
Talent.Benefit: Character may make many melee attacks with single roll.

Talent.Name: Luminen Blast
Talent.Benefit: May discharge stored energy as a ranged attack.

Talent.Name: Master Chirurgeon
Talent.Benefit: Perform advanced medical procedures.

Talent.Name: Master Enginseer
Talent.Benefit: Gain +10 to Tech-Use Tests, and spend Fate Points to automatically succeed on Tech-Use Tests.

Talent.Name: Master Orator
Talent.Benefit: Affect larger groups with Charm and Intimidate.

Talent.Name: Mastery†
Talent.Benefit: May spend Fate Point to succeed on Test.

Talent.Name: Mighty Shot
Talent.Benefit: Add half BS Bonus to ranged Damage rolls.

Talent.Name: Never Die
Talent.Benefit: Ignore penalties from Critical Damage by spending Fate Point.

Talent.Name: Preternatural Speed
Talent.Benefit: Double speed when charging.

Talent.Name: Sidearm
Talent.Benefit: Reduce penalties for fighting with pistol and melee weapon.

Talent.Name: Sprint
Talent.Benefit: Move more quickly in combat.

Talent.Name: Step Aside
Talent.Benefit: May make additional Dodge or Parry attempt.

Talent.Name: Target Selection
Talent.Benefit: May shoot into melee without penalty.

Talent.Name: Thunder Charge
Talent.Benefit: Break enemies with armoured charge.

Talent.Name: True Grit
Talent.Benefit: Reduce Critical Damage taken.

Talent.Name: Warp Lock
Talent.Benefit: Ignore Psychic Phenomenon once per session.

Talent.Name: Abiding Resilience
Talent.Benefit: Regain additional Wounds and Fatigue when spending a Fate Point.

Talent.Name: Bombardier
Talent.Benefit: Bonus to attack with launchers and explosives, improved scatter.

Talent.Name: Cybernetic Calibrations
Talent.Benefit: Improves Craftsmanship of all implanted cybernetics.

Talent.Name: Death Serves the Righteous
Talent.Benefit: Spend Fate Point to change Damage die result of 1 to 10 once per combat.

Talent.Name: Don’t YouDie On Me!
Talent.Benefit: Resuscitate allies who have recently died from Blood Loss or failed Toughness Tests.

Talent.Name: Feat of Strength
Talent.Benefit: Temporarily gain or increase Unnatural Strength Trait.

Talent.Name: Final Judgement
Talent.Benefit: Motivate allies with Command Skill after messily executing an enemy.

Talent.Name: Las Weapon Mastery
Talent.Benefit: Deal increased Damage with Las weapons based on Degrees of Success.

Talent.Name: Lock On
Talent.Benefit: Dodge while maintaining an Aim or Overwatch Action.

Talent.Name: Melta Mastery
Talent.Benefit: Increase Penetration of Melta Weapons based on Degrees of Success.

Talent.Name: Mental Maze
Talent.Benefit: Spend a Fate Point to add Intelligence Bonus to Degrees of Success on Opposed Willpower Tests.

Talent.Name: Overkill
Talent.Benefit: Once per combat encounter, Aim as a Free Action with a chosen ranged weapon type.

Talent.Name: Plasma Mastery
Talent.Benefit: Increase Damage and Penetration when firing Plasma weapons on Maximal setting.

Talent.Name: Ranged Expert
Talent.Benefit: Once per combat, Aim as a Free Action and roll twice for Damage with a chosen ranged weapon.

Talent.Name: Righteous Blow
Talent.Benefit: Roll twice for Righteous Fury and choose result.

Talent.Name: Sacred Flame
Talent.Benefit: Inflict Righteous Fury on a 9 or 10 with Flame Weapons.

Talent.Name: SP Weapon Mastery
Talent.Benefit: Solid Projectile Weapons gain Proven (X) Quality equal to half of Ballistic Skill Bonus.

Talent.Name: Stirring Rhetoric
Talent.Benefit: Once per session, spend a Fate Point to improve the Inspire Special Use of the Command Skill.

Talent.Name: The Flesh is Weak
Talent.Benefit: Gain Machine Trait equal to half the number of Cybernetic implants.

Talent.Name: Trademark Item
Talent.Benefit: Item grants bonus to Interaction Tests and allows extra Sweeping Order.

Talent.Name: Versatile Shooter
Talent.Benefit: Gain the full benefit of the Accurate Quality on Pistol, Heavy, and Vehicle Weapons.

Talent.Name: Veteran Comrade
Talent.Prerequisites: Character Speciality with at least one Comrade
Talent.Benefit: One Comrade grants extra bonuses and can participate in Veteran Orders.
